C.Name: GANTT

Tabber.Info: Mouse actions Left button drag: drag in row - resize, move, create right button drag: drag between rows shift + left button drag: select rectangle double click: select / unselect box ctrl + click: delete box right click: popup menu

Topbar1.TITLE: Drag
Topbar1.RESIZETip:
If and which boxes can be resized.
None - resizing is restricted
Resizable - Only Box types can be resized and Left and Right at one edge
All - Also Solid, Fixed, Left, Right and inner Bound boxes.
The outer Bound boxes and locked and disabled boxes can be never resized.
Here the Solid boxes yellow, Fixed boxes are gray and Bound boxes are pink with black edges.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunResize, by Resize and All flags.
Topbar1.DELETETip:
If the box can be deleted by resizing it to zero width.
If permitted zero boxes, the box is deleted by resizing it to negative width.
Set by XML/JSON attribute GanttResizeDelete, value 0 / 1.
Topbar1.CREATETip:
If and how the boxes can be created by dragging on empty space.
How many and which boxes will be created.
Set by XML/JSON attribute GanttRunNew, list here the boxes
Topbar1.STARTDefaults: |None|Box|Start + Box|Box + End|Start + Box + End|Solid|Start + Solid|Solid + End|Start + Solid + End|Fixed|Start + Fixed|Fixed + End|Start + Fixed + End|Left|Start + Left|Left + End|Start + Left + End|Right|Start + Right|Right + End|Start + Right + End
Topbar1.STARTTip:
If and how the boxes can be created by dragging on empty space in empty cell with no boxes yet.
How many and which boxes will be created.
Set by XML/JSON attribute GanttRunNewStart, list here the boxes
Topbar1.LINESTip:
Which vertical lines will be shown od box edges during dragging.
Slide only - only when moving inside row, on both edges.
Left edge - Also when moving outside row, here only on left edge.
Borh edges - Also when moving outside row, also on both edges.
Set by XML/JSON attribute GanttDragLine, values 0, 1, 2, 3

Topbar3.TITLE: inside row
Topbar3.MOVETip:
How the box can be moved.
Slide - The box can be moved only inside its source row. The order of boxes can be changed only if set Error flag in GanttRunAdjust.
In this example here cannot be set other flags Move, Copy, Remove - they are reserved for Drag between rows, see below.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunMove, by Slide flag.
Topbar3.ALLTip:
If can be dragged also Fixed, Left, Right, Stop and inner Bound boxes.
The outer Bound boxes and locked and disabled boxes can be never dragged.
Here the Fixed boxes are gray and Bound boxes are pink with black edges.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunMove, by All flag.
Topbar3.JOINEDTip:
How the joined boxes will be dragged.
Single - only the caugth box will be dragged.
Next - the caught and next (right) joined boxes will be dragged.
Previous - the caught and previous (left) joined boxes will be dragged.
All joined - all boxes joined with the caught box will be dragged.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunMove, by Single, Next, Prev flags.
Topbar3.NBSPTip:
How the boxes joined by Nbsp (here the red dots) will be dragged.
If set, the Single, Next, Previous and All joined options will split the boxes only on Nbsp.
If not set, the the Single, Next, Previous and All joined options will split the boxes immediately.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunMove, by Nbsp flag.
Topbar3.ADJUSTTip:
How the other boxes in cell will be moved to create space for the dragged box.
None - they will be never moved.
Shift - they will be moved and the empty spaces between them will be preserved.
Shrink - they will be moved and the empty spaces between them will be shrunk.
Slip - they will be moved and the empty spaces between and around them will be preserved.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunAdjust, by Shift, Shrink, Slip flags.
Topbar3.AALLTip:
If also the Fixed, Left, Right, Stop and inner Bound boxes can be moved to create space for the dragged box.
The outer Bound boxes and locked and disabled boxes can be never moved.
Here the Fixed boxes are gray and Bound boxes are pink with black edges.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunAdjust, by All flag.
Topbar3.AERRORTip:
If set, permits dragging the box even if there is no room for it and permits more boxes in the same place, vertically shifted.
It is the only option that permits changing the box order when dragging inside row.
It is still not possible to drag boxes over outer Bound box.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunAdjust, by Error flag.
Topbar3.ANBSPTip:
If set, the Nbsp boxes (red dotted) can be automatically resized to permit the box moving.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunAdjust, by Nbsp flag.

Topbar2.RESIZE:
GanttRunResize controls resizing permissions.
Basic setting for resizing, used for all resizing that have not set special settings (for mouse button or control keys).
In this example is used for all resizing - dragging the box edge.
Topbar2.DELETETip: GanttResizeDelete permits or restricts deleting box by resizing its width to zero on negative value.
Topbar2.NEWTip:
List of boxes that will be created by dragging on empty space.
The format is the same as in standard GanttRun attribute.
Topbar2.STARTTip:
List of boxes that will be created by dragging on empty space in empty row without boxes yet.
The format is the same as in standard GanttRun attribute.
Topbar2.MOVETip:
GanttRunMove controls dragging permissions and changes of the source (dragged) box.
Basic setting for moving, used for all moving that have not set special settings (for mouse button or control keys).
In this example is used for dragging by left mouse button, except for resizing.
In this example its one possible value is Slide for moving inside source row only.
Topbar2.ADJUSTTip:
GanttRunAdjust controls dropping permissions and changes in the destination cell.
Basic setting for dropping, used for all moving that have not set special settings (for mouse button or control keys).
In this example is used for dragging by left mouse button and also for resizing.
Topbar2.LINESTip:
Which vertical lines will be shown od box edges during dragging.
0 - none, 1 - slide only, 2 - also on left edge on move, 3 - also on both edges on move

Topbar1.TITLE: Drag to
Topbar1.MOVETip:
How the box can be moved.
Move - The box will be moved to destination and its source space is filled by Empty box.
Copy - The box will be copied to destination and also remains unchanged in its source location.
Remove - The box will be moved to destination and is removed from its source, the next boxes are shifted to its original place.
In this example here cannot be set value Slide to move inside the source row only - it is reserved for Drag inside row, see above.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunMove, by Move, Copy and Remove flags.
Topbar1.ALLTip:
If can be dragged also Fixed, Left, Right, Stop and inner Bound boxes.
The outer Bound boxes and locked and disabled boxes can be never dragged.
Here the Fixed boxes are gray and Bound boxes are pink with black edges.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunMove, by All flag.
Topbar1.JOINEDTip:
How the joined boxes will be dragged.
Single - only the caugth box will be dragged.
Next - the caught and next (right) joined boxes will be dragged.
Previous - the caught and previous (left) joined boxes will be dragged.
All joined - all boxes joined with the caught box will be dragged.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunMove, by Single, Next, Prev flags.
Topbar1.NBSPTip:
How the boxes joined by Nbsp (here the red dots) will be dragged.
If set, the Single, Next, Previous and All joined options will split the boxes only on Nbsp.
If not set, the the Single, Next, Previous and All joined options will split the boxes immediately.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunMove, by Nbsp flag.
Topbar1.ADJUSTTip:
How the other boxes in cell will be moved to create space for the dragged box.
None - they will be never moved.
Shift - they will be moved and the empty spaces between them will be preserved.
Shrink - they will be moved and the empty spaces between them will be shrunk.
Slip - they will be moved and the empty spaces between and around them will be preserved.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunAdjust, by Shift, Shrink, Slip flags.
Topbar1.AALLTip:
If also the Fixed, Left, Right, Stop and inner Bound boxes can be moved to create space for the dragged box.
The outer Bound boxes and locked and disabled boxes can be never moved.
Here the Fixed boxes are gray and Bound boxes are pink with black edges.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunAdjust, by All flag.
Topbar1.AERRORTip:
If set, permits dragging the box even if there is no room for it and permits more boxes in the same place, vertically shifted.
It is the only option that permits changing the box order when dragging inside row.
It is still not possible to drag boxes over outer Bound box.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunAdjust, by Error flag.
Topbar1.ANBSPTip:
If set, the Nbsp boxes (red dotted) can be automatically resized to permit the box moving.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunAdjust, by Nbsp flag.

Topbar3.TITLE: other row
Topbar3.SELECTTip:
If and how the Selected boxes will be moved. It affects only dragging the Selected box.
Single - Only the Selected boxes will be moved.
Joined - Also the boxes joined with Selected boxes will be moved, according to the Move Joined and Split NBSP settings.
The Selected boxes are here marked by blue dashed border.
One box can be selected by double click, more boxes by creating rectangle by shift + left mouse button dragging.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunMove, by SelectSingle and Select flags.
Topbar3.GROUPTip:
If and how boxes from the same group in the same row will be moved. It affects only dragging box belonging some group.
Single - Only the boxes from the same group as dragged box will be moved.
Joined - Also the boxes joined with the boxes from the same group as dragged box will be moved, according to the Move Joined and Split NBSP settings.
The box groups are in rows 13 and 14, can be changed from popup menu.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunMove, by GroupSingle and Group flags.
Topbar3.ENTIRETip:
Entire (preserve spaces) has two meanings.
If moved Selected or Group boxes, it preserves spaces between boxes.
If not permitted moving Selected or Group boxes, it moves all movable boxes in row together, also preserves spaces between boxes.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunMove, by Entire flag.
Topbar3.MOUSETip:
If set, preserves the position where the box was caught by mouse.
If set, start drop position will be on the box start.
If not set, start drop position will be on mouse position.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunMove, by Mouse flag.
Topbar3.VERTTip:
If set, permits moving boxes only in vertical direction.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunMove, by Vert flag.
Topbar3.SELFTip:
How the dropped boxes will be modified if there is not enough room for them.
Resize spaces - The spaces between boxes (including Nbsp) can be shrunk.
Resize boxes - The (resizable) boxes themselves can be shrunk.
Move left - the drop point can be moved left.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunAdjust, by ResizeNbsp, Resize, Move flags.
Topbar3.APPENDTip:
If and how can be the dropped boxes joined to the destination box, if dropped on this edge.
By NBSP - Joins the boxes by adding zero length Nbsp space between them.
Direct - Joins the boxes directly without any empty box between them.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunAdjust, by AppendNbsp and Append flags.
Topbar3.BETWEENTip:
If set and dropping on some box, it drops next to the nearest edge.
Cannot be used with Error.
If used with Append, it appends on the nearest edge.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunAdjust, by Between flag.

Topbar2.MOVETip:
GanttRunMoveRight controls dragging permissions and changes of the source (dragged) box.
Setting for dragging by right mouse button.
In this example its permitted values are Move / Copy / Remove for moving between rows.
Topbar2.ADJUSTTip:
GanttRunAdjustRight controls dropping permissions and changes in the destination cell.
Setting for dragging by right mouse button.

Topbar1.TITLE: Other
Topbar1.HOVERTip:
If the boxes are highlighted when they are under mouse cursor.
Editable - only editable boxes
All - all boxes.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttHover, values 0, 1, 2.
Topbar1.NBSPTip:
If the NBSP type boxes will be interactive and which boxes will be higlighted if the NBSP type box is under mouse cursor.
Inactive - The NBSP type box will not be interactive.
Self NBSP - It will be interactive and only the NBSP box itself will be higlighted.
Only boxes - It will be interactive and only the adjacent boxes, but not the NBSP box itself, will be highlighted.
All joined - It will be interactive and adjacent boxes and also the NBSP box itself will be highlighted.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunNbspHover, values 0, 1, 2, 3.
Topbar1.JHOVERTip:
Which joined boxes will be highlighted when some box is under mouse cursor.
Self box - only the one hovered box.
All direct - all directly (without NBSP) joined boxes.
All joined - all joined boxes (both directly and with NBSP).
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunJoinedHover, values 0, 1, 2.
Topbar1.GHOVERTip:
Which boxes from the same group as box under mouse cursor will be highlighted.
No - only the one hovered box.
In row - all boxes from the same group in the same row only.
All - all boxes from the same group in the whole grid (can be slow in large grids).
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunGroupHover, values 0, 1, 2.
Topbar1.SELECTDefaults: |None|One|One or none|More in row|In more rows, per row|In more rows, all
Topbar1.SELECTTip:
How many boxes can be selected in grid.
None - selecting boxes is restricted.
One - only one box in grid can be selected, it cannot be unselected.
One or none - maximally one box in grid can be selected, it can be also unselected.
More in row - more boxes in one row can be selected, but all the selected boxes must be in one row.
In more rows, per row - more boxes in grid can be selected, also in more rows, but only boxes from the same row are manipulated (e.g. moved or deleted) together.
In more rows, all - more boxes in grid can be selected, also in more rows and all the selected boxes are manipulated (e.g. moved or deleted) together.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunSelect, values 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5.
Topbar1.CLEARTip:
If the box selection is cleared after the selected boxes are manipulated (e.g. moved or changed).
Can be used only if selecting more boxes in permitted.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunClearSelected, values 0 / 1.
And also in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunMoveRight, flag Clear.

Topbar3.TITLE: settings
Topbar3.JOINEDTip:
Which actions (except dragging) will be done for all directly (without NBSP) joined boxes together.
Change means type and class, Edit means text and tip.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunJoined, bit array, values 0 - 31.
Topbar3.JNBSPTip:
Which actions (except dragging) will be done for all boxes by NBSP together.
Only actions set for directly joined boxes can be done together also for boxes joined by NBSP!
Change means type and class, Edit means text and tip.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunJoinedNbsp, bit array, values 0 - 31.

Topbar3.PERMITTip:
Editing permissions for the Gantt cell, can be set different for every row.
In this example there are used permissions only for Run boxes.
Move - the boxes can be moved and joined.
Resize - the boxes can be resized and split.
New - the boxes can be created and deleted.
Text - the boxes can be changed (text, tip, type, ...).
State - the box state (selected,disabled,locked) can be changed.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttEdit, flags RunMove, RunResize, RunNew, RunText, RunState .
Topbar3.DISABLEDTip:
If the locked and disabled boxes can be manipulated (changed, moved, resized, deleted,...).
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttEditDisabled, values 0 / 1.
Topbar3.MILESTONESTip:
If the Milestone and Stop boxes are permitted to create and show in the Gantt chart.
If not set, all the Milestone and Stop types are shown as zero duration box types Box or Fixed
or they are hidden if the zero duration boxes are not permitted too.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunMilestones, bit array, the first bit, values 0 / 1.
Topbar3.ZEROTip:
If the zero duration boxes are permitted to create and show in the Gantt chart.
If not set, all the zero duration boxes are shown as Milestone or Stop boxes
or they are hidden if the milestones are not permitted too.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunMilestones, bit array, the second bit, values 0 / 2.
Topbar3.ERRORTip:
If the second and next boxes of two or more overlaid boxes are shown in red.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunErrors, values 0 / 1.
Topbar3.SHIFTTip:
How much will be shifted down the second and next overlaid boxes, in pixels.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunErrorsShift, integer value from 0.
Topbar3.MERGETip:
If the overlaid boxes will be merged to one.
Affects only boxes overlaid after some action, not actually overlaid boxes.
On merge the second box increases the first box duration and disappears.
Set in XML/JSON attribute GanttRunError, by Merge flag.

Topbar3.HOVERTip:
GanttHover - if the boxes are highlighted when they are under mouse cursor.
0 - none, 1 - editable, 2 - all
Topbar3.NBSPTip:
GanttRunNbspHover - If the NBSP type boxes will be interactive and which boxes will be higlighted if the NBSP type box is under mouse cursor.
0 - inactive, 1 - self NBSP, 2 - only boxes, 3 - all joined
Topbar3.JHOVERTip:
GanttRunJoinedHover - Which joined boxes will be highlighted when some box is under mouse cursor.
0 - self box, 1 - all direct, 2 - all joined
Topbar3.GHOVERTip:
GanttRunGroupHover - Which boxes from the same group as box under mouse cursor will be highlighted.
0 - no, 1 - in row, 2 - all
Topbar3.SELECTTip:
GanttRunSelect - How many boxes can be selected in grid.
0 - none, 1 - one, 2 - one or none, 3 - more in row, 4 - in more rows, per row, 5 - in more rows, all
Topbar3.CLEARTip:
GanttRunClearSelected - If the box selection is cleared after the selected boxes are manipulated (e.g. moved or changed).
Can be used only if GanttRunSelect>=3
Does not affect dragged boxes, to clear selection after dragging use GanttRunMove(Right) flag Clear
Topbar3.JOINEDTip:
GanttRunJoined - Which actions (except dragging) will be done for all directly (without NBSP) joined boxes together.
1. bit (1) - delete, 2. bit (2) - disable and lock, 3. bit (4) - select, 4. bit (8) - change type and class, 5. bit (16) - change text and tip
Topbar3.JNBSPTip:
GanttRunJoineNbsp - Which actions (except dragging) will be done for all directly (without NBSP) joined boxes together.
Only bits set also in GanttRunJoined are used in GanttRunJoinedNbsp!
1. bit (1) - delete, 2. bit (2) - disable and lock, 3. bit (4) - select, 4. bit (8) - change type and class, 5. bit (16) - change text and tip

Topbar2.PERMITTip:
GanttEdit - Editing permissions for the Gantt cell, can be set different for every row.
In this example there are used permissions only for Run boxes.
RunMove - move and join, RunResize - resize and split, RunNew - create and delete, RunText - any change, RunState - lock, disable select
To permit all the actions for run it is possible to use flag Run instead of all the individual flags.
Topbar2.DISABLEDTip: GanttEditDisabled - If the locked and disabled boxes can be manipulated (changed, moved, resized, deleted,...).
Topbar2.MILESTONESTip:
GanttMilestones - If the Milestone and Stop boxes and zero duration are permitted to create and show in the Gantt chart.
1. bit (1) - if Milestone and Stop are permitted, 2.bit (2) - if zero duration boxes are permitted.
Topbar2.ERRORTip: GanttRunErrors - If the second and next boxes of two or more overlaid boxes are shown in red.
Topbar2.SHIFTTip: GanttRunErrorsShift - How much will be shifted down the second and next overlaid boxes, in pixels.
Topbar2.MERGETip:
GanttRunError - How the error boxes are handled.
Sort - the boxes in run are sorted according to their start dates.
Merge - the overlaid boxes are merged to the first box, automatically does also the sort.

Toolbar.BOXOnChange: Grid.FastGantt = Value=='Fast'; Grid.Cols.GANTT.GanttAdjacentBars = Value=='Adjacent'; Grid.SetStyle(); Grid.RefreshGantt(511);
